About Me

Let me tell a few things about me....

BIO

I have been a civil engineer for more than 12 years international experience, Recently I possessed a deep passion about  "web development". I acquired good knowledge of Javascript, HTML, CSS, Node (on server side), Webpack and other technologies in front-end development. As a sizzling front end developer, I keep my skills aligned with cutting edge technologies and industry trends such as ES6, React, Redux and Node-JS(Express), and pursuing  my mission to constantly develop my skills and never stop learning new technologies.
